heading: Police cautious on declaring Umzumbe murders as work of serial killer
article: The DA in KZN wants the rapes and murders of several women in the Umzumbe area to be investigated as the work of a serial killer, and while police have said they are looking at this possibility, they are not yet ready to make a declaration on a serial murderer.
